title: Meetup – Make community real
description:
Meetup makes community real. Our app helps you find groups of people meeting up in real life who share your interests. Get it now to find out what’s happening near you. Google Play Featured App: New & Updated Apps

People meetup around the things that matter most to them. Popular Meetups include: 
• Tech Meetup groups
• Moms Meetup groups
• Dads Meetup groups
• Fitness Meetup groups
• Hiking Meetup groups
• Career and Networking Meetup groups
• Support Meetup groups
• Book Club Meetup groups
• Photography Meetup groups
• New in Town Meetup groups
• Social Meetup groups
• Dog Meetup groups
• Language Meetup groups
• and 1,000s more!

Questions? Suggestions? Shoot us an email at support@meetup.com

In order to recommend Meetups that are close to you and to show you your distance from a scheduled Meetup, we use your device's precise location (GPS and network-based).
short_desc: Meetup builds real, local community by helping people create groups and events.
what_is_new:
v2.9.3:
• Bug fixes
v2.9.0:
• Start a Meetup right from the app with our new native start flow and subscription management tools
Thanks for using the Meetup app. We’re always excited to hear from you, so please leave a review to let us know what you think. If you really want to make our day, tell your friends so they can start meeting up too!
